message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, $12,000 is significantly below its true worth. How about we meet in the middle at $18,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $18,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $14,000. Can we meet at that price?
